original: "Among all of the demons I have seen I noticed many rivalries. I seen them tear each other apart because of them instead of slaughtering me, thank God. The ones from our world really hate those new intruders but are not willing to put old grudges away..."
translation: “在我见过的所有恶魔中，我注意到了许多竞争。我看到他们因为他们而互相撕碎，而不是屠杀我，感谢上帝。我们这个世界上的人真的很讨厌那些新入侵者，但他们却不愿放下积怨……”

original: A Japanese alcohol made by fermenting rice with the use of yeast and special mold called "koji".  It hasn't been pressed so it has a white, cloudy texture because of rice base sendiments.  You can probaly filter it to make it look more refined.

translation: 一种长着红球的小生物，有着青蛙般的皮肤。它用它的两只小爪子到处跑，躲开人们的视线。
context:
ID: mon_okka
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Youkai_Disco/youkai.json
类型为 MONSTER

https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Youkai_Disco→MONSTER→mon_okka
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=mon_okka

original: A small domesticated predator gone feral in the absence of human stewardship.  Harried by the elements and the rigors of survival, it waggles its two tails...  Wait, nevermind, that's probably not your ordinary cat.
translation: 在没有人类管理的情况下变成野性的小型家养食肉动物。在恶劣的环境和严酷的生存环境中，它摇摆着它的两条尾巴…等等，别担心，这可能不是普通的猫。
context:
ID: mon_nekomata
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Youkai_Disco/youkai.json
类型为 MONSTER

https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Youkai_Disco→MONSTER→mon_nekomata
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=mon_nekomata

original: A small humanoid the size of child, with frog-like skin and turtle-like carapace on it's back.  It carries water in a cavity in its skull and strangely enough in this case a bunch of tools.  What would it need those for?
translation: 一个小孩大小的小型人形生物，有青蛙般的皮肤，背上有乌龟般的甲壳。它在头骨的一个洞里携带水，奇怪的是这里有一堆工具。它需要这些做什么？
context:
ID: mon_kappa_engineer
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Youkai_Disco/youkai.json
类型为 MONSTER

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Youkai_Disco→MONSTER→mon_kappa_engineer
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=mon_kappa_engineer

original: A small humanoid the size of child, with frog-like skin and turtle-like carapace on it's back.  It carries water in a cavity in its skull, has a sharp beak and is known to drag people under the water in order to eat them.  It would prefer cucumbers however.
translation: 一个小孩大小的小型人形生物，有青蛙般的皮肤，背上有乌龟般的甲壳。它在头骨的一个洞里携带水，长着锋利的喙，并且会把人拖到水下吃掉他们。不过，它更喜欢黄瓜。
context:
ID: mon_kappa
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Youkai_Disco/youkai.json
类型为 MONSTER

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Youkai_Disco→MONSTER→mon_kappa
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=mon_kappa

original: A small weasel-like creature, with four sickles instead of its four paws. It flies on an unending gust of hot wind filled with dust and seems to be able to control its direction.
translation: 一种类似黄鼠狼的小动物，用四个镰刀代替它的四只爪子。它在一股永无休止的充满灰尘的热风上飞行，似乎能够控制自己的方向。
context:
ID: mon_kamaitachi
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Youkai_Disco/youkai.json
类型为 MONSTER

original: A tall person with a red face and a long nose, covered in black feathers with wings on its back, wearing a kimono with a mischievous look in the eye.  With a quick glance you also spot its sharp claws, and a wooden club by its belt.
translation: 一个红脸长鼻子的高个子，身上长满黑色羽毛，背上长着翅膀，穿着和服，眼神调皮。一眼望去，你还发现了它锋利的爪子和皮带上的木棍。
context:
ID: mon_tengu
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Youkai_Disco/youkai.json
类型为 MONSTER

original: A tall person with a red face and a long nose, with most of its head however covered up by rags.  From under its kimono you can spot pieces of Japanese armor.  It often meditates and is probably best left to itself.  As for weapons, it's holding a naginata, a dangerous polearm.
translation: 红脸长鼻子的高个子，它的头大部分被破布覆盖着。从和服下面你可以看到日本盔甲的碎片。它经常冥想，也许最好顺其自然。至于武器，它拿着一把薙刀，一种危险的长柄武器。
context:
ID: mon_tengu_monk
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Youkai_Disco/youkai.json
类型为 MONSTER

original: AN UNSUSPECTED TRAGEDY: Recently a young girl has been found dead near the road to a remote village. Her body was covered wholly in signs of animal claws, probably ones of a domesticated cat but the cause of death has not been yet uncovered by the police.
translation: 一个意想不到的悲剧：最近一个年轻女孩被发现死在通往一个偏远村庄的公路附近。她的尸体上全是动物爪子的痕迹，可能是一只家养的猫，但警方尚未查明死亡原因。
context:
ID: undefined
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Youkai_Disco/youkai_snippets.json

original: GHOST SIGHTINGS: TRUTH OR FICTION? Some people have seen recently what they describe as "paranormal activities" such as strange lights seen near swamps or rivers, and more. "I seen one of them, it was the size of a bobcat and pulled my poor dog under the water!", said one of the supposed witnesses.
translation: 幽灵目击：真实还是虚构？一些人最近看到了他们所说的“超自然活动”，比如在沼泽或河流附近看到的奇怪的灯光等等。”我看见其中一个有山猫那么大的，把我可怜的狗拖下了水！”一位目击者说。
context:
ID: undefined
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Youkai_Disco/youkai_snippets.json
类型为 snippet

original: LITTLE RED MEN: Among many recent strange sightings, there have been already more than 52 people claiming to have seen bizarrely dressed men vandalizing churches and synagogues. Supposedly these hooligans are wearing robes and are painted all red, head to toe. Government sources have since suspected "Chinese communist agitators".
translation: 小红人：在最近许多奇怪的目击事件中，已经有超过52人声称看到穿着怪异的人破坏教堂和犹太教堂。据说这些流氓穿着长袍，从头到脚都被涂成了红色。此后，政府消息人士怀疑是“CCP煽动者”。
context:
ID: undefined
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Youkai_Disco/youkai_snippets.json

original: On the outside this robot seems to be of a very old design, similar in look to ancient Japanese automata.  Then you notice its giant size and the fact that, among many unfamiliar symbols, it has a three-leafed nuclear hazard sign.
translation: 从外观上看，这个机器人似乎是一个非常古老的设计，在外观上类似于古老的日本自动人形。然后你会注意到它巨大的尺寸，事实上，在许多不熟悉的符号中，它有一个三叶形的核危险标志。
